TopicTitle: ground disappears when i go to launch

Articles.Content:
hi, i just recently updated and gone to 1.02 and everything is fine till i go launch and then everything disappears apart from the menu's?

it was working fine till i updated wondering if i was missing anything?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-13T20:41:50Z" title="06/13/2015 08:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 13, 2015</time> by krazyrocketman**

Hi krazyrocketman, can you [**please see this thread**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide) and provide your log files ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
